p: In vivo, the CH 2 and central n‐3 CH 3 peak were fitted with single Gaussian lines and the CH 3 peak was fitted with two Gaussian lines (in vivo prior knowledge). Since the J‐modulation of the CH 3 group was unknown, outer triplet CH 3 peaks were approximately fitted with a second Gaussian line to minimize a possible influence on the quantification of the relatively small n‐3 CH 3 peak.
